bibl.title: Notes on Herodotus' Sesostris (Hdt. II 102-110).
bibl.note: 1. The failure in the Red Sea. - 2. The presence and anonymity of Sesostris' wife. - 3. The punishment of Sesostris' brothers. - 4. The Episode of the Conspiracy and Egyptian Propaganda. - Avec résumé en anglais.
